name: Hamusta
description:
This game was developed for final year project for Multimedia course. At first of the game, you can know if you are qualified to take care of hamster or not. You can also choose hamster for yourself (though this DEMO only get to choose one only). Learn something new about hamster and apply them in real life if you ever want to get a hamster or you want to improvise your available hamster's life.

This game (DEMO ver) was developed 95% by me while some background, music and sfx were from royalty free website.

The information about hamster in this game was taken with permission by some hamster association.

Hamusta will be developed further with more people in the team and some funds so if you donate to this game, I highly appreciate them!
